summary: All static analysis checks passed successfully. The program is ready to build and start.

syntax_validation.description: All Python files have valid syntax
syntax_validation.details: No syntax errors found in any source file

module_imports.details: config.py, entities.py, game.py imports successful. pygame-ce 2.5.6 installed and accessible.

dependency_check.warning: Python 3.11.14 detected but spec requires >=3.12. This may cause compatibility issues.

entry_point.details: main() function exists and is callable via __name__ == '__main__'

code_quality.description: No obvious code quality issues detected
code_quality.details: No direct exit() or quit() calls that would bypass clean shutdown

runtime_notes: Virtual environment (.venv) already exists with pygame-ce installed
All core game mechanics implemented: digging, rock physics, enemy AI, pump weapon
Game state representation supports AI training with grid-based observation
recommendations: Consider upgrading to Python 3.12+ to fully meet the specification requirement
The game uses pygame-ce (community edition) which is the correct library as specified
